#Region N-Calculation rules: Dimension:Metrics Indicators

   #@AutoGenerated
   ['Metrics Indicators':{'Status'}]=N:IF(ISUNDEFINEDCELLVALUE(['Metrics Indicators':'Score'])=1, 
   UNDEFINEDCELLVALUE,

   1,

   ['Metrics Indicators':{'Trend'}]=N:IF(ISUNDEFINEDCELLVALUE(['Metrics Indicators':'Score'])=1%ISUNDEFINEDCELLVALUE(IF(ATTRS('Month', !Month, 'previousperiod')@='', 
   UNDEFINEDCELLVALUE,

   UNDEFINEDCELLVALUE,

#Region Link rule: Metrics < Income Statement - Numeric
#Source cube: Income Statement
#Target cube: Metrics
#Autogenerated LINK NUMERIC 7D4C696E6B5F4D657472696373205F334320496E636F6D652053746174656D656E74
#@AutoGenerated
['Metrics Indicators':{'Target','Actual','Forecast'}] = N:IF(DIMIX('Account', 
    !Metrics) <> 0, DB('Income Statement', 'Base', !organization, 
    !Year, !Month, !Metrics, ATTRS('Metrics Indicators', !Metrics Indicators, 
    '}Map_}Link_Metrics _3C Income Statement')), CONTINUE);
#EndRegion
